scripts.start: npx concurrently --kill-others --names "DEBUGGER,WASM,LIB" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgGreen.bold" "npm run debugger:watch" "npm run wasm:watch" "npm run lib:watch"
scripts.build: npm run wasm:build && npm run lib:build
scripts.test: npm run build && npx mocha test/accuracy/accuracy-test.js --exit
scripts.test:accuracy: npm run build && npx mocha test/accuracy/accuracy-test.js --exit
scripts.test:performance: npm run build && npx mocha test/performance/performance-test.js --exit
scripts.debugger:deploy: npm run debugger:build && npx gh-pages -d build
scripts.wasm:build: npx asc wasm/index.ts -b dist/wasm/index.untouched.wasm -t dist/wasm/index.untouched.wast -O3 --validate --sourceMap assets/index.untouched.wasm.map --memoryBase 0 && cp dist/wasm/index.untouched.wasm.map assets/index.untouched.wasm.map && echo "Built Wasm!"
